titleStmt.title: A list of the old and new regiments of horse and foot, under the command of the Right Honourable Robert Sidney Earle of Leicester, Viscount Lisle, Baron of Beachurst, &c. Lord Lieutenant of the Kingdome of Ireland, and generall of his Majesties forces in the said kingdome, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Jun. 15. London, printed for T. Walkley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
